Instruction: Peel and core the pineapple, then finely chop it.
In a large mixing bowl, combine shredded cabbage, grated carrots, and chopped pineapple.
In a separate bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, apple cider vinegar, honey, salt, and black pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the cabbage mixture in the large bowl.
Toss the coleslaw gently until the ingredients are evenly coated with the dressing.
Refrigerate the pineapple coleslaw for at least 30 minutes before serving to allow the flavors to meld.
Serve the chilled pineapple coleslaw as a refreshing and flavorful side dish.
